title: Sysmon WMI Event Subscription Created
description: Detects creation of WMI event subscriptions (EventID 19/20/21), commonly used for stealthy persistence.
sigma:
title: Sysmon WMI Event Subscription Created
id: RULE-009
description: Detects creation of WMI event subscriptions (EventID 19/20/21), commonly used for stealthy persistence.
author: detpack-lab
status: stable
logsource:
  product: windows
  service: sysmon
detection:
  selection:
    EventID:
      - 19
      - 20
      - 21
  condition: selection
falsepositives:
  - Legitimate management tooling using permanent WMI subscriptions
level: high
tags:
  - attack.t1546
  - attack.persistence
